example.parse: (S (VP (CV انثري) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP علي) (NP (PRON_1P نا))) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ورود) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN محبت) (NP (POSS_PRON_2FS ك))))) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC اغماراً)) (PUNC ,) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ كي) (S (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S نتبارك) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (PRON_2FS ك)))))
النقب هي منطقة قد تباركت بمعادن مختلفة مدفونة فيه

arg.g: different metals which are buried in it

frameset.edef: to be raised far above (With Allah Only)

example.parse: فمن عرف الله تبارك وتعالى عرفه من خلال نعمه
